== Introduction ==
Runtu is a Russian build of Ubuntu Desktop with own design, pre-installed full Russian language support, set of restricted multimedia plugins, hardware drivers, and set of other packages, which useful by Russian Ubuntu users.

== Contact Information ==
WEB: http://runtu.org

Forum: http://forum.runtu.org

Jabber conference: runtu@conference.jabber.ru
